vsParam:
That monster was so powerful...
Can we keep fighting in this state...

That dragon is exceptionally powerful...
Do we even stand a chance? Investigation alone won't help...

Haha! We failed this time. So what? Initial failures are
perfectly normal. Don't take it to heart.

Um... But still, we can't be unaffected by the defeat.
Even [px]'s items were of no avail...

Besides, the dragon flied away, and we almost
got no new information...

Oh, come on!
Are you going to keep being this frustrated!?

It's just one failure. No big deal!
We can still fight, can't we?!

Th-that's true, but we're not that dragon's match...
Mimi, you felt how powerful it is, didn't you?

Sure, I acknowledge that dragon is indeed powerful!
But this is not the reason for you to quit.
You'll leave that dragon wrecking the whole country?

So, quitting is off the table.
Anyhow, we have no other choice but to defeat it.

Think about it.
Why do we need to fight? Why do we need to defeat it?

To protect Bressisle that's hometown to everyone...
And to protect...

See?... Don't you know that perfectly clear?
So, stop being so downhearted!

Haha... Thanks for the pep talk, Mimi!
You remind me of something more important!

Th-this is not some pep talk. Don't talk nonsense!
It's just you were so spineless that I couldn't stand it...

Ahem... Anyway!
Let's report what we found as much as possible?

I think this is a scale from that dragon?
It may come in handy someday?

A scale! This is a valuable clue!
Let's take it back and show it to Ru Sensei!

Oh, off you go!
I'll let you know when the dragon comes back.

Yeah, thank you, Scalcap!
We'll take down that dragon next time!

Yeah! We need to be stronger to that end!
From now on, let's carry out a special training! Come on, [px]!!

Gosh... You were frustrated one second ago,
but now, you're so ambitious... How simple you are!

Nothing... I'm just under the impression that you can't sit back
and watch. You said it's for your family reputation...

Huh? Ah... I-it must be my delivery!
Mostly, it's for my own sake!

Y-yeah... Exactly. I need to defeat that dragon
so as to make my mark in this world...

Hey~ Sterk, Mimi! We're leaving without you two.
You may get lost, catch up!

What? I'll never get lost!
Hey, wait! Don't leave me alone here!

Alright, given that they are so determined to protect their
hometown and partners, so as a knight, I'll try my best too...
